geolocationError.unknown: Unknown error while retrieving your position.

geolocation.title: Geolocation Permission
geolocation.description: NoNetChat wants to access your geographical location to connect you with nearby users. Your location data is processed securely and in compliance with GDPR.
geolocation.privacy_point2: Unencrypted local storage on your device only
geolocation.data_collected_desc: GPS coordinates (latitude/longitude), approximate city and country
geolocation.purpose_desc: P2P connection with geographically close users
geolocation.retention_desc: Coordinates are automatically deleted from the server after disconnection
geolocation.withdrawal_info: You can withdraw your consent at any time in the privacy settings. For more information, see our

geolocation.title: Geolocation data
geolocation.city_country: City and country (via IP geolocation API)

profile.title: Profile data
profile.legal_basis: Legitimate interest for the operation of the service (Art. 6.1.f GDPR)

messages.title: Messages and conversations
messages.local_only: Stored unencrypted on your device only (IndexedDB/localStorage)
messages.legal_basis: Performance of the service contract (Art. 6.1.b GDPR)

rights.title: Your GDPR rights
rights.access_desc: View your data in the settings
rights.rectification_desc: Edit your profile at any time
rights.portability_desc: Export your data in JSON format

security.title: Security and protection
security.encryption: Peer-to-peer exchanges use AES-GCM; local storage remains unencrypted on your device
security.no_central_server: No data collection by a central server

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or the exercise of your rights:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of terms
acceptance.content: By using NoNetChat, you agree to these terms of use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the service.

service_description.title: Service description
service_description.content: NoNetChat is a decentralized, peer-to-peer messaging application that allows users to communicate securely without a central server. The service offers:
service_description.feature3: Unencrypted local data storage on your device

user_obligations.title: User obligations
user_obligations.respect_laws: Comply with applicable laws and regulations
user_obligations.no_harassment: Do not harass, threaten, or intimidate other users
user_obligations.no_illegal_content: Do not share illegal, offensive, or inappropriate content
user_obligations.respect_others: Respect the privacy and rights of others
user_obligations.accurate_info: Provide accurate information in your profile

prohibited_uses.title: Prohibited uses
prohibited_uses.copyright: Violation of copyright or intellectual property rights
prohibited_uses.reverse_engineering: Reverse engineering or attempting to compromise the service

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.content: NoNetChat is provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages resulting from the use of the service.
liability.disclaimer: The user is solely responsible for the content they share and the interactions they have with other users.

modifications.title: Modifications to the terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. The modifications will take effect upon their publication. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: You may stop using the service at any time. We reserve the right to suspend access to the service in case of violation of these terms.

governing_law.title: Governing law
governing_law.content: These terms are governed by French law. Any dispute will be submitted to the jurisdiction of the competent French courts.

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.note_value: Data is stored locally unencrypted on the user's device

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual property
intellectual_property.content: NoNetChat is a free software distributed under an open source license. The source code is publicly available and can be modified according to the terms of the license.

open_source.title: Open Source
open_source.content: This project is open source and community contributions are welcome.

export.title: Export my data
export.description: Download all your personal data in JSON format

delete.title: Delete all my data
delete.description: Permanent deletion of all your personal data
delete.confirm_description: This action is irreversible. All your data will be permanently deleted.
